statements: SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT sender_address, recipient_address, transaction_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, recipient_address FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE is_suspicious = TRUE
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE sender_address LIKE '%John%'
SELECT transaction_id, recipient_address, transaction_date, is_suspicious FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, recipient_address FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE is_suspicious = TRUE AND sender_address = '0x1234'
SELECT recipient_address, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions GROUP BY recipient_address ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 23:59:59'
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE is_suspicious = TRUE
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x123abc';
SELECT timestamp, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x456def';
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE sender_address='0x123' AND receiver_address='0x456';
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT t.*, tm.metadata_key, tm.metadata_value FROM cryptocurrency_transactions t JOIN transaction_metadata tm ON t.transaction_id = tm.transaction_id WHERE tm.metadata_key='label';
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_wallet_address, receiver_wallet_address, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users ORDER BY username;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE sender_wallet_address = 'abc123' OR receiver_wallet_address = 'def456';
SELECT status_id, transaction_id, user_id, status FROM ComplianceStatus WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sender_wallet_address, receiver_wallet_address, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT u.username, u.email, c.status FROM Users u INNER JOIN ComplianceStatus c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.status = 'approved'
SELECT t.*, u.full_name FROM Transactions t LEFT JOIN Users u ON t.sender_wallet_address = u.username
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM Transactions
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_date, receiver_address FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, transaction_date FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance < 5000;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT c.transaction_id, c.sender_address, c.receiver_address, t.compliance_status FROM cryptocurrency_transactions c JOIN regulatory_compliance t ON c.transaction_id = t.transaction_id;
SELECT u.user_name, u.account_balance, t.transaction_date FROM user_accounts u JOIN cryptocurrency_transactions t ON u.user_id = t.transaction_id WHERE t.amount < 500;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.sender_address, m.metadata_key, m.metadata_value FROM cryptocurrency_transactions t JOIN transaction_metadata m ON t.transaction_id = m.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, td.currency, rd.compliance_score FROM cryptocurrency_transactions t JOIN transaction_details td ON t.transaction_id = td.transaction_id JOIN regulatory_data rd ON t.transaction_id = rd.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_data WHERE risk_level = 'High';

SELECT aa.analysis_id, aa.classification, aa.confidence, ua.username FROM ai_analysis aa JOIN regulatory_data rd ON aa.data_id = rd.data_id JOIN cryptocurrency_transactions t ON rd.transaction_id = t.transaction_id JOIN user_accounts ua ON t.sender_address = ua.email;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, td.currency, rd.compliance_score, aa.classification FROM cryptocurrency_transactions t JOIN transaction_details td ON t.transaction_id = td.transaction_id JOIN regulatory_data rd ON t.transaction_id = rd.transaction_id JOIN ai_analysis aa ON rd.data_id = aa.data_id WHERE rd.risk_level = 'High' ORDER BY rd.compliance_score DESC, aa.confidence DESC;

SELECT username, email, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM user_accounts JOIN cryptocurrency_transactions ON user_accounts.account_id = cryptocurrency_transactions.transaction_id GROUP BY username, email ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE sender_address LIKE '%abc%' AND receiver_address LIKE '%xyz%' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
